description.raw:
A previous pull request broke tests on Homebrew:

http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_transport-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/27/

* Do not lock the `NodeShared` mutex when calling `Discovery::TopicList()` or `Discovery::ServiceList()`, use two hearbeat cycles to consider discovery initialized and reduce the connection wait from 300 to 100 ms.
* Reduce waiting period after zmq socket connections.

CI results:

* [Trusty](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64/69/) :large_blue_circle:
* [Homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/68/) :large_blue_circle:
* [Windows](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/155/) :large_blue_circle:
